Detailed Description

Class implementing dumm Module.

Does absolutly nothing with frame except showing it. Only for debugging purposes and probably will be deleted in later stage of development. Shows very basic implementation of module.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ModuleVideo::ModuleVideo ( QObject *  parent = 0 ) [explicit]

Constructor showing how to create new module.

Calls init method which create VideoWidget for this module. Creates SettingsWidget. Connects AbstractSettingsWidget::showVideoChanged(bool) to Module::setVideo(bool) slot.

Parameters:
parent
